query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS doctor_verification_requests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'under_review', 'approved', 'rejected', 'requires_more_info') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  national_id_number VARCHAR(100),
  medical_license_number VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  license_issuing_authority VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  license_issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
  license_expiry_date DATE,
  specialty VARCHAR(100),
  subspecialty VARCHAR(100),
  years_of_experience INT,
  medical_school VARCHAR(255),
  graduation_year INT,
  national_id_document_key VARCHAR(512),
  national_id_document_url VARCHAR(1024),
  medical_license_document_key VARCHAR(512),
  medical_license_document_url VARCHAR(1024),
  medical_degree_document_key VARCHAR(512),
  medical_degree_document_url VARCHAR(1024),
  additional_documents_json TEXT,
  reviewed_by INT,
  reviewed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  review_notes TEXT,
  rejection_reason TEXT,
  additional_info_requested TEXT,
  submitted_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)

  review_notes TEXT,

  submitted_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
